attributes.action: Stop destroying  the identity and quality of life of indigenous Britons -  curtail immigration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the indigenous people of these islands demand that Mr Brown and his government immediately cease destroying England and thus the Union with runaway immigration and over population. This governments instincts are authoritarian and ultimately fascist in nature, we must return to democratic rule. Stop this insanity Now, listen to our people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
